item.title: Maroon 5 - Memories - Baritone Ukulele - Key of C
item.description:
For Educational Use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: C, G, Em, Am, F
Content warning: song may not be appropriate for school use ("'Cause the drinks bring back all the memories")
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/6wZkxxXB-io
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/m/maroon-5/memories-two/
**************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Are you a teacher using ukulele in the classroom? Check out my video based method...effective, easy, and inexpensive! https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/the-video-ukulele-method/
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Jack Stauber - Buttercup
item.description:
Buttercup by Jack Stauber, with lyrics. Chords used: Gmaj7 & F sharp minor. For educational use. The chords for the intro and outro have been intentionally omitted to make it easier to play. The Gmaj7 could be replaced with a regular G chord. The F sharp minor chord is the same shape as a G7, just played on strings 2, 3, and 4.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Cavetown - This Is Home
item.description:
Ukulele play along
This Is Home - Cavetown
Using the chords: A C Cm Cmaj7 Em G
Suggested Strum Pattern: D D DU / DU D DU D or D DU DU DU You can be quite flexible with the strumming, just keep it very light.
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: http://www.youtube.com/c/UkuleleWales T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

STRUMMING PATTERN / RASGUEO:
Verse / Verso: D D D Chorus / Estribillo: D UD UDU (x3) D D UDUDU
D: Down / Hacia abajo U: Up / Hacia arriba x: Muted strigs (Down) / Cuerdas muteadas con la palma de la mano (hacia abajo)
________________________
Hey! If you liked this video, give me a like, subscribe and comment your doubts, suggestions or anything you want.

item.title: Johnny Hates Jazz - Shattered Dreams - Baritone Ukulele - Key of Am, A#m
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: Em, Bm, C, Am, D, A, Fm, Eb, Bb, C#, Bbm
As performed by Johnny Hates Jazz

item.title: Somebody To Love Connor Maynard C G Am F - Key of C
Panic! At The Disco - Into The Unknown
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords Used: G, D, Bm, Dm, C, F, Dm7, A, D, E, C#m, Cm, Bb
As performed by PANIC! AT THE DISCO, as featured in Disney's FROZEN II
